name: George Women's Plus-Size Ponte Suiting Jacket

reviews.name: George Women's Plus-Size Ponte Suiting Jacket
reviews.reviewText: I promise, this jacket is not as dowdy as the photo makes it look. It hits at my hips, it comes in slightly at my waist, the shoulders fit me well (has small shoulder pads that can be easily cut out) and the sleeves were fully lines. The jacket is knit, so it definitely has stretch, but it's ponte, so it holds a very nice shape. I would like to buy this in navy as well.
reviews.title: Very nice blazer, perfect for work

reviews.name: George Women's Plus-Size Ponte Suiting Jacket
reviews.reviewText: The fabric of this jacket was quite warm and the jacket did not fit me well. It was big in the bust and small in the hips.
reviews.title: Fit was not quite right

reviews.name: George Women's Plus-Size Ponte Suiting Jacket
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect fit just like a glove and so comfortable ! Perfect for work! Would definitely purchase more!
reviews.title: Comfort and perfect fit!
